cleaned_text: to better chronic disease management through functional and integrative medicine. It was such a great meeting! I've already put into practice new labs/interventions this week! [](https://www.linkedin.com/in/rajinder-rai-pharmd?trk=public_post_reshare_feed-actor-image) I help women professionals in midlife regain control of their life, health, and career with my 12 week program, RISE | Midlife Strategist| Menopause Mentor | Integrative Pharmacist| Speaker "The doctor of the future will give no medicine, but will instruct his patients in care of the human frame, in diet and in the cause and prevention of disease." -Thomas Edison I attended the A4M- 29th Annual World Congress , Redefining Medicine by "building a more resilient medical system that centers on science-based, whole person care" this past weekend. It was so inspring to be surrounded with practioners from around the world who are truly invested in this goal. I had an opportunity to listen to leaders in healthcare, connect with other like minded practioners, as well as learn about the latest products and services. My biggest takeaway from the conference, I am even more convinced in the essential role pharmacists can bring to the table. Pharmacists-are you ready to redifine your role in Women's Health? Send me a DM to learn
